I'm one of Jehovah's Witnesses. The use of words doesn't bother me unless they are used to slander or otherwise hurt a person or group. The fact that we don't celebrate ******** (birthdays) is fairly well known. We chose not to *******(fornicate), commit *******(adultery) or ******(steal) as well. By the way, when human's die they do not Burn in ****(hell). Wow, how many words will disappear before the correctness police are satisfied?
I satirize to make a point. Though the good folks behind the word Ban are trying to do something worthy it is probably best to let people use their God given brains to distinguish proper use of words.
PS - By the way, many religions have already taken the name Jehovah out of their Bible's. They did that to placate religious leaders who did not like the name.
